title: Wrong PixcelBuffer from WriteableBitmap
body:
This bug is easy to reproduce:
var wbmp = new WriteableBitmap(480,640);
await wbmp.SetSourceAsync(stream); //the stream comes from a picture with larger size, i.e. 960x1280
Now check the properties of wbmp:
PixelWidth: 960
PixelHeight: 1280
PixelBuffer.Length: 1228800
